section.name: Online-store
section.p: This sample is the one explained in the how-to, take a look at the both the model and the deployable web application .
In order to get the most out of this sample you should take note of the following points:

ul.li: Any web container able to deploy WAR bundles should work.
Point your browser to the following URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/online-store
